WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

My WPP console crash everytime when I go to the report tab and if I checked the "show only computers group with approval" before it finish to load all groups information.

WPP run on the WSUS Master server with 2 downstream replicas, on Windows Server 2012 R2.
My WPP version is 1.3.1405.24, version that DCourtel sent me 3 weeks ago.
WorkItem.Summary: The WPP console crash everytime on report
